content:
What visual tools do you recommend to work with FHIR resources ?
I have found:
http://clinfhir.com/
https://github.com/smart-on-fhir/fhir-viewer

Is there any other?

Forge and Simplifier are specialized tools for authoring and rendering profiles (StructureDefinition), and some other conformance resources:
https://simplifier.net/
https://simplifier.net/forge

Are there any open-source tools, libraries or frameworks that graphically display patient data for example like clinFHIR does it in a certain kind of way with the patient Viewer? The aim would be to graphically show the patient data from the patient point of view.
Is there something like a website or so where i can find them?
